about_the_game:
Collect the mightiest factions in the Warhammer 40,000 universe, build the ultimate deck and fight in fast-paced card battles to forge your path to glory! Warhammer 40,000: Warpforge is a free-to-play collectable digital card game based on the grim dark future of the 41st Millennium.

COMMAND YOUR FAVOURITE FACTION RIGHT AWAY

Play with ten of the most popular Warhammer 40,000 factions from the start, with more factions coming to the game in the future through regular content expansions. You will get a starter deck for each faction from the beginning and can choose which faction you earn rewards for through the in-game campaign system. Build your ideal deck quickly and conquer the rankings!

PLAY A CARD GAME LIKE NO OTHER

Discover unique gameplay mechanics, perfectly tailored to the Warhammer 40,000 universe. Your Warlord leads your army from the front, actively engaging enemy units. Units can choose to attack in Ranged or Melee mode, adding a new dimension and depth to combat. Each faction boasts unique mechanics evocative of their fighting style: Orks benefit from ‘Mob’ attacks, Tyranids ‘Swarm’ together and Necrons ‘Reanimate’ their troops!

FIGHT IN SHIFTING BATTLEFIELDS

Scenarios also play a role in battle. At the start of each match, the player going first will be able to choose the moment of the attack, triggering environmental effects for both players and changing the scenario itself! Each battleground provides different options, each adding new factors to take into account when strategizing your path to victory.

A LOVE LETTER TO THE WARHAMMER 40,000 UNIVERSE

Explore the lore and universe of the Warhammer 40,000 franchise as you fight in stunningly crafted battlefields, from Black Legion spaceships to the interior of Aeldari Craftworlds. All cards feature amazing artwork and voice acting, representing the breadth and depth of each faction, and transporting you to the heart of the battlefield, with numerous dialogue options for each warlord and unique interactions among them.

Prepare to fight for survival in brutal card battles in the 41st Millennium!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, including infrequent strong language, depictions of violence and gore, and online interaction between players.
